queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{post-install-job}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{post-install-job}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hpe-flexvolume-driver}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{flexvolume}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hpe-flexvolume-driver}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{flexvolume}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.containers.name=post-install-job.securityContext should be set
metadata.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}}.spec.containers.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}}.securityContext.capabilities should be set
spec.containers[flexvolume].securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hpe-flexvolume-driver}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hpe-flexvolume-driver}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{hpe-flexvolume-driver}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{hpe-flexvolume-driver}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=post-install-job has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=post-install-job does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{post-install-job}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{hpe-dynamic-provisioner}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{hpe-flexvolume-driver}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{flexvolume}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true

queries.description: Container should not use secrets as environment variables

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{flexvolume}}.env.name={{PROVIDER_PASSWORD}}.valueFrom.secretKeyRef' should be undefined
'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{flexvolume}}.env.name={{PROVIDER_USERNAME}}.valueFrom.secretKeyRef' should be undefined
'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{flexvolume}}.env.name={{PROVIDER_IP}}.valueFrom.secretKeyRef' should be undefined
'spec.template.spec.containers.name={{flexvolume}}.env.name={{PROTOCOL}}.valueFrom.secretKeyRef' should be undefined
